name: Sailing Ship (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 5 miles per hour (120 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Control:
text: Move up to the speed of its sails, with one 90-degree turn. If the helm is destroyed, the ship can't turn.

trait.name: Movement:
text: Hit Points: 100; -5 ft. speed per 25 damage taken
Locomotion (water): sails, speed 45 ft.; 15 ft. while sailing into the wind; 60 ft. while sailing with the wind.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 16 (3d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Weapons:
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 200/800 ft. (can't hit targets within 60 ft. of it), one target. 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4
